DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety IDP-121 Lotion IDP-121 Vehicle Lotion Treatment Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase 3 , Multi-Center , Randomized , Double-Blind , Vehicle-Controlled , 2-Arm , Parallel Group Comparison Study Comparing Efficacy Safety IDP-121 Lotion IDP-121 Vehicle Lotion Treatment Acne Vulgaris
